channel.title: Dave Winer
channel.description: On the net since mid-70s. Started two Silicon Valley companies. Wrote for Wired. Fellow at Harvard, NYU. Founder of podcasting, blogging, RSS. Open web.

item.description: The Best Brands of Chocolate Liqueur.

source:outline.text: The Best Brands of Chocolate Liqueur.

item.description: We're a lazy, fat culture, Russia knows and is taking full advantage.

source:outline.text: We're a lazy, fat culture, Russia knows and is taking full advantage.

item.description: Putin has the power to put down impeachment, and from there, will complete the replication of the political system of Russia in the US, where political opponents are jailed or assassinated, as with uncooperative journalists.

source:outline.text: Putin has the power to put down impeachment, and from there, will complete the replication of the political system of Russia in the US, where political opponents are jailed or assassinated, as with uncooperative journalists.

item.description: Think of it as a two party system about to become one party. The one that prevails in impeachment will have the right to anihilate the other, and must do it.

source:outline.text: Think of it as a two party system about to become one party. The one that prevails in impeachment will have the right to anihilate the other, and must do it.

item.description: Impeachment is the last gasp bet that the rule of law still works, even though the Supreme Court has been stuffed with Russian puppets, as has the Senate.

source:outline.text: Impeachment is the last gasp bet that the rule of law still works, even though the Supreme Court has been stuffed with Russian puppets, as has the Senate.

item.description: Fox News Condemns 2020 Election As Partisan Witch Hunt Orchestrated By Democrats To Unseat President.

item.description: Seeing what Trump is doing to America, many find it hard to fight off despair.

item.description: Do you want impeachment to have a chance? Candlelight vigils, nightly, across the US and perhaps the world, through the New Year. What happens in the US in January will determine the fate of democracy world wide.

source:outline.text: Do you want impeachment to have a chance? Candlelight vigils, nightly, across the US and perhaps the world, through the New Year. What happens in the US in January will determine the fate of democracy world wide.

item.title: Elizabeth Warren is a zombie too
item.description: 2016: There was a time when I would have voted for Elizabeth Warren for anything. For President, for god, for Fifth Beatle, you name it. But then something happened.
